name: Agent Amazement (Play in browser)
description:
This is a one man game developement project and the game is very much in the prototyping phase, development going on strong! Any comments or suggestions are very welcome.

MOVE: WASD
SHOOT: ENTER
RESTART: R
QUIT: ESC
PAUSE: P

THE NEXT VERSION WILL INCLUDE:
MUTE MUSIC: M
MUTE SOUNDS:N
